data.name: October German Beer Festival - The Biggest in the World
data.app_name: October German Beer Festival - The Biggest in the World
data.description:
This VR Experience is a real visit to the German Beer Festival in Munich in Virtual Reality.
Wolfgang Brehm the official city guide of Munich accompanies you around the festival and explains you everything.

There are no simulation all is real. It is a real visit.

You have never seen this before. 
This is the ultimate VR Experience ... frameless. 

You get a unique impression of the biggest folk festival in the world. It has been held annually since 1810 on the Theresienwiese in Munich. Experience the most important beer tents (also from inside), the Bavaria (incl. ascent to the head), traditional festival and shoe platters and many attractions such as a round trip on the ferris wheel. Let yourself be carried away into the world of Bavarian traditions, Dirndl & Lederhosen, beer tents, Munich’s beer, Bavarian music, beer mugs, shoe platters, chain carousel, giant wheel and many more. The tour starts at the main entrance and shows all the top sights. 

Some examples: 
- Along the Wirtsbudenstraße with many large beer tents
- Tent Fischer-Vroni (how”fish on a stick” is made) 
- Hofbräu tent (the largest beer tent at the festival with space for approx. 10,000 guests) 
- Augustiner-Festhalle (here you can buy beer from the wooden barrel) - Visit of Bavaria (ascent to the head of Bavaria) - Käfer Wies’n Schänke (where you can meet the celebrities) 
- Traditional festival (shoe platters) 
- Ride with the ferris wheel (great view of the festival)

#VRtravelX #VRTravel
